languages.text: Хладная торговка, что недавно присоединилась к свите Вольного Торговца, уже готова вести дела — малые и великие. Лорд-капитан волен выслушать интригующее предложения Джай на капитанском мостике своего корабля

traits.locale_text: Джай — хладный торговец, что недавно присоединилась к свите Вольного Торговца

languages.text: The Cold Trader who recently joined the Rogue Trader's retinue is ready to conduct business big and small. The Lord Captain can listen to Jae's intriguing business propositions on the captain's bridge.
languages.original_text: Хладная торговка, что недавно присоединилась к свите Вольного Торговца, уже готова вести дела — малые и великие. Лорд-капитан волен выслушать интригующее предложения Джай на капитанском мостике своего корабля

traits.locale_text: The Cold Trader, who recently joined the Rogue Trader's retinue, is ready to conduct business big and small. Lord Captain can listen to Jae's intriguing business offers on the captain's bridge.

The Cold Trader who recently joined the Rogue Trader's retinue is ready to conduct business big and small. The Lord Captain can listen to Jae's intriguing business propositions on the captain's bridge.

The Cold Trader who recently joined the Rogue Trader's retinue is ready to conduct business big and small. The Lord Captain can listen to Jae's intriguing business propositions on the captain's bridge.

languages.text: L'adepte du Commerce Froid qui a récemment rejoint l'entourage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} est prête à faire des affaires, quelles qu'elles soient. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} peut entendre les propositions intrigantes de Jae sur la passerelle.
languages.original_text: The Cold Trader who recently joined the Rogue Trader's retinue is ready to conduct business big and small. The Lord Captain can listen to Jae's intriguing business propositions on the captain's bridge.

traits.locale_text: L'adepte du Commerce Froid qui a récemment rejoint l'entourage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} est prête à faire des affaires, quelles qu'elles soient. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} peut entendre les propositions intrigantes de Jae sur la passerelle.

languages.text: 最近加入行商浪人队伍的冷市商人已经做好了进行贸易的准备。行商浪人可以前往舰桥处，聆听婕伊有趣的商业建议。
languages.original_text: The Cold Trader who recently joined the Rogue Trader's retinue is ready to conduct business big and small. The Lord Captain can listen to Jae's intriguing business propositions on the captain's bridge.

traits.locale_text: 最近加入行商浪人队伍的冷市商人已经做好了进行贸易的准备。行商浪人可以前往舰桥处，聆听婕伊有趣的商业建议。

languages.text: 最近自由開拓者の従者の仲間入りをした闇商人は、大小さまざまなビジネスを展開する用意がある。ロード・キャプテンはブリッジでジェイの興味深いビジネスの提案を聞くことができる。
languages.original_text: The Cold Trader who recently joined the Rogue Trader's retinue is ready to conduct business big and small. The Lord Captain can listen to Jae's intriguing business propositions on the captain's bridge.

traits.locale_text: 最近自由開拓者の従者の仲間入りをした闇商人は、大小さまざまなビジネスを展開する用意がある。ロード・キャプテンはブリッジでジェイの興味深いビジネスの提案を聞くことができる。

languages.text: Die Kalthändlerin, die sich kürzlich dem Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} angeschlossen hat, ist bereit für kleine und große Geschäfte. Der Lord Captain kann sich Jaes faszinierende Vorschläge auf der Brücke anhören.
languages.original_text: The Cold Trader who recently joined the Rogue Trader's retinue is ready to conduct business big and small. The Lord Captain can listen to Jae's intriguing business propositions on the captain's bridge.

traits.locale_text: Die Kalthändlerin, die sich kürzlich dem Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} angeschlossen hat, ist bereit für kleine und große Geschäfte. Der Lord Captain kann sich Jaes faszinierende Vorschläge auf der Brücke anhören.

languages.text: La Comerciante Frío que se ha unido recientemente al séquito de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente está lista para toda clase de negocios. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán puede escuchar las propuestas de negocios de Jae en el puente.
languages.original_text: The Cold Trader who recently joined the Rogue Trader's retinue is ready to conduct business big and small. The Lord Captain can listen to Jae's intriguing business propositions on the captain's bridge.

traits.locale_text: La Comerciante Frío que se ha unido recientemente al séquito de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente está lista para toda clase de negocios. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán puede escuchar las propuestas de negocios de Jae en el puente.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in maiyetine yakın zamanda katılan Soğuk Tacir, küçük ve kapsamlı işlere atılmaya hazır. Lord Kaptan, Jae'ın ilgi çekici iş tekliflerini kaptanın köprüsünde dinleyebilir.
languages.original_text: The Cold Trader who recently joined the Rogue Trader's retinue is ready to conduct business big and small. The Lord Captain can listen to Jae's intriguing business propositions on the captain's bridge.
